data.title: Village Roadshow Studios
data.meta_description: Village Roadshow Studios | 1,461 followers on LinkedIn. Where movie magic is made! | Village Roadshow Studios are a set of film studios located in Oxenford, Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia. Situated adjacent to the Warner Bros. Movie World Theme Park, the Studios offer world-class film production facilities comprising of nine Sound Stages, three water tanks, ten production offices, editing suites, wardrobe, makeup, construction, paint and carpentry shops.
data.text:
üçøGodzila x Kong: The New Empire Official Trailer is here! üé¨ The sequel was produced at Village Roadshow Studios! Congratulations to all Cast and Crew involved in this incredible project! üé≠We can not wait to see in theaters April 12, 2024! #warnerbros #legendary #godzillavskong #godzillavskongthenewempire https://lnkd.in/gu4zpqTk

üì£ Excitement is in the air as #villageroadshowstudios welcomes to the lot Hollywood director Ron Howard and the talented cast and crew of Eden Productions. üèÜ The Academy Award-winning director Ron Howard returns to the Gold Coast with Imagine Entertainment and AGC Studios feature, with filming commencing on November 27. üé¨ The production promises not only to be a cinematic masterpiece but also a boost to the Queensland economy, generating an estimated $26.5 million and creating over 300 local jobs. Lights, camera, action! üé¨

Last week, We were excited to receive a filmmaking commission from the Asia Pacific Screen Awards during the 5th Asia Pacific Screen Forum followed by the 16th Asia Pacific Screen Awards Ceremony. We were able to showcase our facilities and our Support Companies Panavision, Cutting Edge Features & Television and Myriad Studios.

üé¨ Last month we received the visit of the @unisqcollegeaus Students currently on the final year of Film and Television. They were keen to see and hear from the industry. üé• Gina Black Film Advisor from the Gold Coast Film Commission along with Lynne Benzie Studios President shared their knowledge and heard the students‚Äô aspirations and skills. üéûÔ∏è We thank our tenants @myriadstudiosfilm, @panavisionofficial, @CuttingedgeFtv Cutting Edge and Disney Lighting to also open their doors and share a little bit of their expertise.

üèÜ We are extremely pleased and proud to announce Village Roadshow Studios President, Lynne Benzie was awarded the winner in the Professionals category at the Gold Coast Bulletin Women of the Year Awards by Harvey Norman for 2023. üé¨ For over 30 years, Lynne has been a passionate advocate for the film industry on the Gold Coast and it is wonderful to see her recognized in this manner for her incredible contribution and ongoing efforts to raise awareness for the arts and wave the flag for such an integral industry. #GCBulletin #GCBWOFTY
